comments:
Hello,

I am facing this problem on every second time i try to build using build.xml. As a result eclipse has to shut down and restart everytime.

Full detail is like this:

Message : Internal error occurred retrieving targets

eclipse.buildId=M20060629-1905
java.version=1.5.0_06
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=solaris, ARCH=sparc, WS=gtk, NL=en
Command-line arguments:  -os solaris -ws gtk -arch sparc

Abhishek

Thank you for the bug report.
See bug 143008 comment #6 for the workarounds.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 143008 ***
